COLUMBUS
God be my witness, I explained to
the Queen that the gold should be
used to liberate the Holy Sepulchre!
GARCIA
The Holy Sepulchre cannot be set free
with gold, • .gold comes not from God
and cannot lead towards God; it comes
from his adversary and returns to him,
and all of you with it. . . gold engend'
ers envy and slaughter, naught else!
COLUMBUS
- Gold is the commerce of the earth!
GARCIA
(speaking always more slowly and
gradually fading)
No! God has taught mankind something
greater, more holy and more living
than human intercourse. He has taught
him Communion. Commerce in gold means
commerce in crime. It is blood and
betrayal. , . Gold is misery. . . foul
misery which drags mankind from prison
to prison until some form of death
overtakes him.
COLUMBUS
Garcia. . . Garcia, where has thou
gone? Garcia. . •
VOICE
The compass is fluctuating again, . .
VOICE
The needle is pointing again to the
west.. . •
JUAN
Admiral, the compass has fluctuated
again!
